name: CircularFifoQueue_peekTest
description: Unit tests for the peek functionality of the CircularFifoQueue class.

test_cases.name: testPeekWhenQueueIsEmpty
test_cases.description: Tests the peek method when the queue is empty.

test_cases.name: testPeekWhenQueueHasOneElement
test_cases.description: Tests the peek method when the queue has one element.

test_cases.name: testPeekWhenQueueIsFull
test_cases.description: Tests the peek method when the queue is full.

test_cases.name: testPeekAfterRemovingElements
test_cases.description: Tests the peek method after removing elements from the queue.

test_cases.name: testPeekAfterAddingMoreThanCapacity
test_cases.description: Tests the peek method after adding more elements than the queue's capacity.

test_cases.name: testPeekAfterClear
test_cases.description: Tests the peek method after clearing the queue.

test_cases.name: testPeekAfterRemovingAllElements
test_cases.description: Tests the peek method after removing all elements from the queue.

test_cases.name: testPeekWithNoSuchElementException
test_cases.description: Tests the element method to ensure it throws NoSuchElementException when the queue is empty.
